election_setup.introduction.step1: Each Guardian generates a pair of keys: a public encryption key and a secret decryption key.
election_setup.introduction.step2: The Guardians combine their encryption keys to create the election encryption key for the election.
election_setup.introduction.step3: Each Guardian exchanges decryption keys with the other Guardians to create their part of the key that will unlock the election after Election Day.
election_setup.introduction.step4: As the keys are exchanged, each Guardian confirms that they have received keys from all the other Guardians. The process continues until all keys are exchanged.

key_ceremony.introduction.title: Welcome to the Key Ceremony
key_ceremony.introduction.description: In the key ceremony, you and the other Guardians will create secret codes, or keys, to secure the election. Those keys will be used to start the election. Then, when Election Day ends, they will be used to decrypt (or unlock) the election to confirm the final count.
key_ceremony.introduction.steps_descript: The key ceremony has seven steps.
key_ceremony.introduction.step1: Each Guardian generates a pair of keys: a public encryption key and a secret decryption key.
key_ceremony.introduction.step2: The Guardians combine their encryption keys to create the official encryption key for the election.
key_ceremony.introduction.step3: Each Guardian then creates a partial decryption key.
key_ceremony.introduction.step4: The Guardians exchange their partial decryption keys with one another.
key_ceremony.introduction.step5: As the keys are exchanged, each Guardian confirms that they have received keys from all the other Guardians. The process continues until all keys are exchanged.
key_ceremony.introduction.step6: Finally, the Guardians combine their partial decryption keys to create the election decryption key.
key_ceremony.introduction.step7: The key ceremony is complete, and the election can begin!
key_ceremony.meet_guardians.title: Meet the Guardians
key_ceremony.meet_guardians.description: There are 5 Guardians appointed for the Municipal election to be held on November 2, 2021. When all of the Guardians have checked in, the key ceremony will begin.
key_ceremony.create_keypair.title: Create your personal encryption and decryption keys
key_ceremony.create_keypair.description: These are your personal keys to encrypt and decrypt the election. You will need both of these keys at the end of the election. They will be stored on your YubiKey. Do not lose your YubiKey!
key_ceremony.share_public_key.title: Share your personal encryption key with the other Guardians
key_ceremony.share_public_key.descriptio: The encryption keys are the first piece of the joint election key. Share your encryption key, then wait for the other Guardians to do the same.
key_ceremony.create_backups.title: Create your partial decryption key
key_ceremony.create_backups.description: Use your personal decryption key to create a partial decryption key. This will help make the key that will unlock the election after Election Day.
key_ceremony.share_backups.title: Exchange your partial decryption key with the other Guardians
key_ceremony.share_backups.description: Your partial decryption key will be exchanged with the partial decryption keys from the other Guardians. Share your partial decryption key, then wait for the other Guardians to do the same.
key_ceremony.verify_backups.title: Confirm the other partial decryption keys
key_ceremony.verify_backups.description: Confirm each partial decryption keys you received from the other Guardians. The system will let you know when these keys are ready for confirmation, or if there is a problem with anyone's key. The other Guardians will also confirm your partial decryption key.
key_ceremony.combine_keys.title: Form joint election key
key_ceremony.combine_keys.description: Almost done! The joint election key is made out of the Guardians' combined decryption keys. Share your decryption key, then wait for the other Guardians to do the same.
key_ceremony.complete.title: Key ceremony complete
key_ceremony.complete.description: You have successfully completed the key ceremony. Thanks for participating!
